# Compadre

## Acessing Data

```{r}
Comadre <- cdb_fetch("comadre")
ComSub <- subset(Comadre,
                   Class == "Aves" & #
                   MatrixTreatment == "Unmanipulated" &
                   MatrixCaptivity == "W") 
```

## Manipulation

```{r}
ComFlag <- cdb_flag(ComSub)
ComSubFlag <- subset(ComSubFlag,
                      check_NA_A == FALSE &
                      check_ergodic == TRUE)
```

## Growth rates

```{r}
ComSub$lambda <- unlist(lapply(matA(ComSub), popbio::lambda))

#Examine the distribution of population growth rates:
GrowthHist <- ggplot(ComSub, aes(x = lambda)) +
  geom_histogram()+
  geom_abline(y=1)

GrowthHist
```
